name: Purple Dragon
description:
As a child growing up in the 1970-1980s in rural Indiana USA, we relied on the use of CB radios to communicate with neighbors, the school bus, the school, the tiny store in the speck of a town a few miles away.  

My very large family was known as the dragon family and each of us assigned a different color.  Thus I was known as Purple Dragon in out local CB radio world.  I thought it would be fun to make an NFT based on this avatar.
